sentences.en: Do you give precedence as well to the one who files first for a patent?
sentences.cn: 你们对首先申请专利的人也给予优先权 吗 ?

sentences.en: Financial measures take precedence over other matters.
sentences.cn: 财政措施比其他事情重要.

sentences.en: Guests were seated in order of precedence .
Items encapsulated in parenthesis are evaluated first and have the highest precedence.
sentences.cn: 先给包含在括号中的项目赋值,它拥有最高的优先权.

sentences.en: National defence must take precedence over all other questions.
sentences.cn: 国防问题必须优先考虑.

sentences.en: Precedence involves assigning a priority level to a call.
sentences.cn: 优先就是确定呼叫的优先权等级.

sentences.en: Radiologic diagnosis will be given precedence.
sentences.cn: 将给予放射学诊断以优先.

sentences.en: She had to learn that her wishes did not take precedence over other people's needs.
sentences.cn: 她必须懂得，自己的愿望不能先于别人的需要。

sentences.en: The French kings claimed precedence over those of Spain.
sentences.cn: 法国国王提出比西班牙国王享有优先权.

sentences.en: The guests were seated strictly in order of precedence.
sentences.cn: 客人严格按照地位高低就座.

sentences.en: The needs of the community must take precedence over ( ie must be met before ) individual requirements.
sentences.cn: 公众的利益高于个人的利益.

sentences.en: The royal couple left, followed by the rest of the company in order of precedence.
sentences.cn: 国王和王后伉俪走在前面, 其余陪伴的人员按先后顺序跟在后面.

sentences.en: The Trademark Office, of course, gives precedence to the person who files first.
sentences.cn: 商标局对申请在先的自然予以优先.

sentences.en: These are questions which take precedence of all others.
sentences.cn: 这些都是应该优先考虑的问题.

sentences.en: This task must be given precedence over all others.
sentences.cn: 这一工作必须先做,其他一切后做.

sentences.en: Very often the picture takes precedence over the point.

phrases.tran_cn: 优先于；地位高于；比…重要

trans.tran_cn: 领先，优先权，地位先后，级别高低，位次
trans.tran_en: when someone or something is considered to be more impor-tant than someone or something else, and therefore comes first or must be dealt with first
